DOC.brief_summary: This is an observational study that will monitor patient's clinical outcomes. A patient can enroll in the NiCord® Long Term Follow Up Protocol only after the informed consent has been signed, and he/she has completed the study specific follow-up.
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Follow Up Protocol for NiCord Patients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Anyone who has received a NiCord® transplant, completed study specific follow up, and has signed the consent for this study. Exclusion Criteria
